overview: The Punk in Drublic Documentary will show how this scene is in progress and how these bands reach the stage, talking to the guys who had the initial idea, the crew and bands that made it a reality.  Following the festival around the world, more than 3 years of footage showing the backstage, live performances and a close interaction with Fat Mike and the Band members, Not any bands, the bands and the characters in the festival are the most successful in the scene NOFX, BAD RELIGION, RANCID, PENNYWISE, THE OFFSPRING, LESS THAN JAKE, THE INTERRUPTERS, GOLDFINGER AND MANY MORE...  The festival is a dream coming through for every punk rocker.
title: Punk in Drublic Documentary
